item.title: Focusing Your Unconscious Mind: Learn Hard Concepts Intuitively (And Forever)
item.description: YouTube video by Colin Galen TL;DR: Guide the learning process by trying to “invent” the concepts you are learning, with genuine interest.

item.title: Personally Defined Rules For Learning With AI
item.description: Fundamentally, AI should be used as a first-point substitution for scanning of documentation, rubber ducky-ing as well as a tool to reduce start-up friction to tasks — but rarely as a tool for bridging gaps in logic ability.
